questions.question: How many assignments in LP2 laboratory
questions.answer: LP2 has in all 10 assignments , out of which 6 are AI and 4 are cloud computing

questions.question: Does LP2 has practical examinations
questions.answer: Yes , LP2 has 25 mark practical examinations

questions.question: Does LP2 have Termwork
questions.answer: Yes , LP2 has 25 mark term work

questions.question: What is the room number of LP2 lab for M1
questions.answer: M1 BATCH LP2 Laboratory is located at A1 - 314

questions.question: Who is the lab teacher for M1 LP2 Batch
questions.answer: LP2 is taught by Urmila Pawar mam to M1 batch

questions.question: What is assignment 1 of LP2
questions.answer: Implement depth first search algorithm and Breadth First Search algorithm, Use an undirected graph and develop a recursive algorithm for searching all the vertices of a graph or tree data structure.

questions.question: What is assignment 2 of LP2
questions.answer: Implement A star Algorithm for any game search problem.

questions.question: What is assignment 3 of LP2
questions.answer: Implement Greedy search algorithm for any of the following application: I. Selection Sort II. Minimum Spanning Tree III. Single-Source Shortest Path Problem IV. Job Scheduling Problem V. Prim's Minimal Spanning Tree Algorithm VI. Kruskal's Minimal Spanning Tree Algorithm VII. Dijkstra's Minimal Spanning Tree Algorithm .

questions.question: What is assignment 4 of LP2
questions.answer: Implement a solution for a Constraint Satisfaction Problem using Branch and Bound and Backtracking for n-queens problem or a graph coloring problem.

questions.question: What is assignment 5 of LP2
questions.answer: Develop an elementary chatbot for any suitable customer interaction application.

questions.question: What is assignment 6 of LP2
questions.answer: Implement any one of the following Expert System I. Information management II. Hospitals and medical facilities III. Help desks management IV. Employee performance evaluation V. Stock market trading VI. Airline scheduling and cargo schedules

questions.question: What is assignment 7 of LP2
questions.answer: Case study on Amazon EC2 and learn about Amazon EC2 web services.

questions.question: What is assignment 8 of LP2
questions.answer: Installation and configure Google App Engine.

questions.question: What is assignment 9 of LP2
questions.answer: . Creating an Application in SalesForce.com using Apex programming Language.

questions.question: What is assignment 10 of LP2
questions.answer: Design and develop custom Application (Mini Project) using Salesforce Cloud.
